abstracts.cdata!:
This report on the Electricity Access
            (Rural) Expansion Project, and Energy Access Project of
            Ethiopia provides the findings of an INT administrative
            inquiry (the Investigation) into allegations of corrupt,
            fraudulent, collusive, and/or coercive practices, as defined
            by the WBG for purposes of its own policies, rules and
            procedures (the WBG's Framework regarding
            Anti-corruption), in relation to the WBG-supported
            activities. The purpose of the Investigation was to allow
            the WBG to determine if the WBG's Framework regarding
            Anti-corruption has been violated. This Report is being
            shared to ensure that its recipients are aware of the
            results of the INT Investigation.
